MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY8 postcode area of Leven. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30am to disconnect the generators from the Simon Crescent substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:34am on 17th January
